title: desperately seeking this font
content:
i’m searching for this crappy font,

it’s 4 am here in germany and i have to translate some stupid box text from italy and those guys transformed all the type to paths.

so does anyone have an idea what this font is called?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703180403/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_54.jpg) | 82.87 KB |
author: deadrascal

comments.content:
Sorry, no idea.  
But an old toothbrush and some boot polish would do the trick.
and would look a lot better, but theres no time to handmake every headline for every language for almost 30 boxes :-(

Looks like [Erikrighthand](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703180403/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1EU) by Erik v. Blokland. You’d better send those requests into the [TypeID-board](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703180403/http:/typophile.com/typeid), you’ll get faster answers. And don’t forget to read the [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703180403/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq) first.

it’s very obviously erik right hand, yes.

dr
